data.title: Ontario College of Teachers on LinkedIn: #onted #ontario #brainawarenessweek
data.meta_description: How does teaching self-regulation help prevent crises, disruptive behaviours and help teachers resolve classroom management issues? Learn more with this ebook…
data.text:
Have questions about your membership with the College? Members and applicants are strongly encouraged to use the self-serve options available on the College’s website: http://oct-oeeo.ca/info. Please note: documents and payments are not accepted in person. If you cannot upload a document electronically, hard copies can be deposited in the College’s drop box, located behind our office at 101 Bloor Street West, off St. Thomas Street. Vous avez des questions sur votre adhésion à l’Ordre? Nous vous encourageons à utiliser nos options libre-service en ligne à http://oct-oeeo.ca/infofr. N.B. : Nous n’acceptons pas les documents ou paiements en personne. Si vous ne pouvez pas nous envoyer un document électroniquement, vous pouvez le déposer dans la boite située à l’arrière de nos bureaux, au 101 de la rue Bloor Ouest, dans l’allée adjacente à la rue St. Thomas.

Teachers, today on #InternationalYouthDay, inspire children and young adults to develop their potential and reach for their goals using these selections from the Margaret Wilson Library: http://oct-oeeo.ca/6dm36m #OntEd #Ontario

On #IndigenousPeoplesDay, dive in to these compelling stories and diverse Indigenous perspectives with our selection from the Margaret Wilson Library: http://oct-oeeo.ca/5h93k4 #OntEd #Ontario

We are closed today for the Civic Holiday but will return to regular business hours tomorrow from 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. EDT.

The College will be closed tomorrow for the Civic Holiday. We will return to regular business hours on Tuesday, August 6 from 8:30 a.m. to 5 p.m. EDT.
